author: akritkbehera
body:
(pull/pr.number/head) instead of pr.head.ref. This ensures the Jenkins can fetches the correct pull request head, even when the PR branch name is not accessible in the source repository.
Resolves [#2587 ](https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/issues/2587)
title: Updated CMS_BOT_TEST_BRANCH assignment to pull the pr.number head
